description: stunnel-msspi brings a native support of operating system certificates and private keys in Windows and other operating systems which supports [SSPI](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa380493%28v=vs.85%29.aspx) for SSL/TLS connections.
summary: stunnel-msspi brings a native support of operating system certificates and private keys in operating systems which supports SSPI
author: Dmitrii Pichulin
